name: ravimid (3DS)
description:
ravimid is a homebrew game for 3DS

play as a local pyramidman as you crawl, fight, and ascend your way to save your father

Originally posted on http://www.glorioustrainwrecks.com/

Developed with "LövePotion" by Ruairidh "VideahGams" Carmichael
https://github.com/VideahGams/LovePotion

Special Thanks:

VideahGams for listening to me on IRC

Everyone at Jake's house who played the game

Alex

+ You!
